item.title: C# like events in C++ - second approach
item.description: Hi Everyone ! About year ago I try to implement events for 2DXngine. Right now when I try to implement game I realize that this implementation is insufficient for my current needs. Previous events need to store binding in order to unsubscribe, use macro to create bindings and so on. This …

item.title: Functional flavor in C# 7 with pattern matching
item.description:
With many great features C# 7 comes with new and shiny pattern matching. I know that this feature is less usable then in other languages, but it add new possibilities to coding. In this article I want to share with you my experiments with monads.
